arts.ttl: Milan Star Striker Delivers Honest Assessment of Dismal Atalanta Defeat
arts.sum: Alvaro Morata was on the scoresheet, but Milan slumped to a season-defining 2-1 loss at Serie A leaders Atalanta on Friday evening. Despite holding up his end of the bargain, the Spaniard couldn't help the Rossoneri avoid defeat at the Gewiss Stadium. The post Milan Star Striker Delivers Honest Assessment of Dismal Atalanta Defeat appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: No Room for Feigned Humility as Atalanta Coach Talks Big Post-Milan Win
arts.sum: Atalanta continued to make waves in Serie A with a well-deserved 2-1 home victory against fierce rivals Milan on Friday evening. Ademola Lookman's late winner propelled Gian Piero Gasperini's side to the top of the table, even if for 48 hours. The post No Room for Feigned Humility as Atalanta Coach Talks Big Post-Milan Win appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: “We deserved to win”: Gasperini reflects on memorable victory over Milan
arts.sum: Atalanta secured a significant victory against AC Milan, winning 2-1 in a thrilling match that showcased their resilience and determination. The post “We deserved to win”: Gasperini reflects on memorable victory over Milan appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: “A special victory”: De Ketelaere shines in Atalanta’s win over Milan
arts.sum: In a thrilling encounter at the Gewiss Stadium, Atalanta triumphed over AC Milan with a 2-1 victory, marking their ninth consecutive win in Serie A. The post “A special victory”: De Ketelaere shines in Atalanta’s win over Milan appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Pulisic exits Milan loss in first half with calf injury
arts.sum: United States captain Christian Pulisic was forced off the field with an injury in the first half of AC Milan's 2-1 loss to Atalanta on Friday.

arts.ttl: European football: Lookman’s late winner sends Atalanta top of Serie A
arts.sum: Atalanta beat Milan 2-1 to leapfrog Napoli at summit Inter third after comfortable win over Parma A late goal from Ademola Lookman secured Atalanta a hard-fought 2-1 win over Milan on Friday, lifting the hosts to the top of Serie A. Three minutes before full-time, a corner sailed across the box and an unmarked Lookman headed in the winner. The result propelled Atalanta to the top of the standings with 34 points, two ahead of Napoli, who will play fifth-placed Lazio at home on Sunday. Milan are seventh with 22 points. arts.ttl: Atalanta earn 9th straight win, go top of Serie A
arts.sum: A late strike from Ademola Lookman secured Atalanta a hard-fought 2-1 win over AC Milan on Friday, lifting the hosts to the top of Serie A.
